member.summary: Operation completed successfully

member.summary: Some Engine components are missing or inaccessible

member.summary: One or more parameters are not valid

member.summary: Feature is not implmeneted

member.name: F:DPFP.Error.ErrorCodes.IO
member.summary: A generic I/O file error occurred

member.name: F:DPFP.Error.ErrorCodes.NoMemory
member.summary: There is not enough memory to perform the action

member.name: F:DPFP.Error.ErrorCodes.Internal
member.summary: An unknown internal error occurred

member.name: F:DPFP.Error.ErrorCodes.BadSetting
member.summary: Initialization settings are corrupted

member.name: F:DPFP.Error.ErrorCodes.UnknownDevice
member.summary: The requested device is not known

member.name: F:DPFP.Error.ErrorCodes.InvalidBuffer
member.summary: A buffer is not valid

member.name: F:DPFP.Error.ErrorCodes.FeatureSetTooShort
member.summary: The specified fingerprint feature set or fingerprint template buffer size is too small

member.name: F:DPFP.Error.ErrorCodes.InvalidContext
member.summary: The given context is not valid

member.name: F:DPFP.Error.ErrorCodes.InvalidFeatureSetType
member.summary: The feature set purpose is not valid

member.name: F:DPFP.Error.ErrorCodes.InvalidFeatureSet
member.summary: Decrypted fingerprint features are not valid. Decryption may have failed

member.name: F:DPFP.Error.ErrorCodes.Unknown
member.summary: An unknown exception occurred

member.name: T:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback
member.summary: Capture Feedback

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.Good
member.summary: The fingerprint sample is of decent quality

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.None
member.summary: The fingerprint sample is missing, or was not received

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.TooLight
member.summary: The fingerprint sample is too light

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.TooDark
member.summary: The fingerprint sample is too dark

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.TooNoisy
member.summary: The fingerprint sample is too noisy

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.LowContrast
member.summary: The fingerprint sample contrast is too low

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.NotEnoughFeatures
member.summary: The fingerprint sample does not contain enough information

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.NoCentralRegion
member.summary: The fingerprint sample is not centered

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.NoFinger
member.summary: The scanned object is not a finger

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.TooHigh
member.summary: The finger was too high on the swipe sensor

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.TooLow
member.summary: The finger was too low on the swipe sensor

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.TooLeft
member.summary: The finger was too close to the left border of the swipe sensor

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.TooRight
member.summary: The finger was too close to the right border of the swipe sensor

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.TooStrange
member.summary: The scan looks strange

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.TooFast
member.summary: The finger was swiped too quickly

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.TooSkewed
member.summary: The fingerprint sample is too skewed

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.TooShort
member.summary: The fingerprint sample is too short

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.TooSlow
member.summary: The finger was swiped too slowly

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback.TooSmall
member.summary: The size of the fingerprint sample is too small
